name: Aquapac Mini Camera Case 408
description: Take great pictures while kayaking, rafting or snorkelling. On land, the case protects your digital camera from dust and grit.Made of UV-stabilized polymers that don't break down or discolour in sunlight.In direct sunlight, the air inside a transparent case heats up and causes condensation, to reduce this use desiccant packs.High-frequency welded seams are as strong as the surrounding material.Case dimensions are 11.5 x 18.5cm.Fits a camera with a 20cm circumference. Not suitable for cameras with a zoom lens.Equipped with an adjustable lanyard.Guaranteed to IPX8 standard, submersible to 5m.Both the Aquapac® warranty and MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee cover this case itself. Neither guarantee covers the contents you put inside the case.
